entry.title: Converted Blog to Octopress
entry.content:
Balls

Crap

OJ

I’m an inline-style link

This is a sentence with some emphasis And some underscores

Scratch through

.. unorderered list .. thing1 .. thing2 .. thing3

  1. a
  2. b
  3. c

javascript var s = "JavaScript syntax highlighting"; alert(s);

python s = "Python syntax highlighting" print s

No language indicated, so no syntax highlighting. But let's throw in a <b>tag</b>.
